name: Lost Communication
description:
This is an experimental horror adventure made in less than 48h for GMTKJam. You communicate with your friend though series of clicks, and guide him through a bunker haunted by a malevolent demon. You will need sound to play the game, headphones recommended.

Its basically a horror game where you don't control your own character.

I joined the jam pretty late, so it lacks polish, but it is fully playable and very unique.

Controls and keys:

LMB - Interact

RMB - Zoom

alt-f4 - Exit game ;)

alt-enter - Switch fullscreen

Things used:

Unreal Engine 4

Black Ops One (Font)

Blender (For 3d modelling)

PixPlant (To create textures)

Cubase (For the ambient tracks)

Gimp 2 (For texture and screenshot modifying)
